_source.text: Adjusting for quality of competition - Stajan faces the second-toughest sledding among centres behind Backlund in an effort to shield the younger kids - we have a Relative Corsi QoC that's, again, better than everyone but Backlund.

text: behind Backlund in an effort to shield the **younger** kids - we have a Relative Corsi QoC that's, again, **better** **than** everyone but Backlund.
Adjusting for quality of **competition** - Stajan faces the second-toughest sledding among centres

_source.text: 2. Because of his age, a secretagogue is going to work much better than in a younger person, and HGH isn't necessary unless at high levels of competition (unless you have the money to throw away on it).

text: 2. Because of his age, a secretagogue is going to work much **better** **than** in a **younger** person, and
HGH isn't necessary unless at high levels of **competition** (unless you have the money to throw away on it).
